snippet.title: The Mermaid's Tongue - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs The Game Awards Edition Digital Showcase
snippet.description: From the creators of Snipperclips and Tangle Tower, comes The Mermaid's Tongue. Join members of the development team at SFB Games for a look at The Mermaid's Tongue, which is the latest Detective Grimoire adventure game. The Mermaid's Tongue is a murder mystery detective adventure featuring the titular detective and his assistant, Sally, searching for clues and talking to suspects to uncover a mystery. The Mermaid's Tongue will be available in 2024 on consoles and Steam, and a demo is available now on Steam.
